channel.title: Wishes on B.USOC - Belgian User Support and Operations Centre
channel.description: Recent content in Wishes on B.USOC - Belgian User Support and Operations Centre

item.title: Best Wishes for 2017 !
item.author: social_media@busoc.be (B.USOC)
item.description: To illustrate 2016 and to celebrate the new year , we show you a picture from the Mars Yard in United Kingdom, when USA astronaut Tim Peake controlled the rover , Bridget (2016 April 29), from the ISS during the METERON SUPVIS-M experiment . Credit : ESA. The whish card 2017 is here: https://flic.kr/p/PCmjc5 The background wallpaper for your screen is here: https://flic.kr/p/PFzG1R The original picture is from the flickr account @esa_events : https://www.
